content: # 8. Activating and Examining the Workflow In this step of the workflow, you will learn how to activate your workflow and change the default workflow settings. Activating a workflow means that it will run automatically every time a trigger node receives input or meets a condition. By default, all newly created workflows start deactivated. To activate your workflow, set the **Inactive** toggle in the top navigation of the Editor UI to be **Activated**. Nathan's workflow will now be executed automatically every Monday at 9 AM:
